scripts.stop: npm run client:stop && npm run server:stop && docker-compose down
scripts.client:restart: docker-compose exec client pm2 restart client
scripts.client:start: docker-compose exec client pm2 start client
scripts.client:stop: docker-compose exec client pm2 stop client
scripts.server:add: docker-compose run server npm --prefix /usr/app/server run strapi install
scripts.server:restart: docker-compose exec server pm2 restart server
scripts.server:stop: docker-compose exec server pm2 stop server
scripts.server:start: docker-compose exec server pm2 start server
